page.title: 09Pencombe Summer Fete 1985.
page.content: This is an annual event,held on the school field and in the village hall, every July.The event is held on a Saturday and starts at 2.00p.m. The fete is very popular among the villagers and also attracts much attention from the surrounding farms, particularly those of our grid. The afternoon starts with the judging of the competitions being held.These are especially for the children of all ages.There includes a painting competition for all the children in the village school,a best dressed teddy bear,for the younger children,decorated plate for the older children.Also a fancy dress competition is a popular event with the younger children.This year a child dressed up as a Boxer won.
